section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on February 11, 2025.*
section.heading: ANC comments.
section.text: The ABC Board shall accord great weight to input provided by an affected ANC regarding the proposed or existing location of a retailer when approving or rejecting an application for a license.
section.codify:annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of § 7-1671.06j, see § 7j of Medical Cannabis Clarification and Program Enforcement Emergency Amendment Act of 2024 (D.C. Act 25-627, Nov. 13, 2024, 71 DCR 14129).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 7j of Medical Cannabis Clarification and Program Enforcement Emergency Amendment Act of 2024 (D.C. Act 25-627, Nov. 13, 2024, 71 DCR 14129).
